## query certain chipgroup

<img src='inst/report/group_ID.PNG' align="right" height="120" />

```{r}
group_ID <- "P1761451"

query_result <- query_mongoDB("limslager","UID",group_ID)

EDL <- query_result%>%
  RJobTissueArea:::get_EDL_from_query_result()

attris <- RJobTissueArea:::find_all_attributes_in_EDL(EDL)
```
